sentences.en: a sudden elevation of blood pressure
After his elevation to the papacy, he reigned for two years.
sentences.cn: 他升任教皇后在位两年。

sentences.en: All bearings are on immovable supports at the same elevation.
sentences.cn: 全部轴承都位于同样高度不可动的支承上.

sentences.en: Along this transect the rise in elevation is gradual.
sentences.cn: 沿着这条植被带海拔上升舒缓.

sentences.en: His elevation to sainthood is entirely justified.
sentences.cn: 他荣升为圣徒是有充分理由的。

sentences.en: His elevation to the position of General Manager was announced yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天宣布他晋升总经理职位.

sentences.en: It is generally assumed that a reaction does not change in elevation.
sentences.cn: 通常假定反力在垂直切面内不发生变化.

sentences.en: Rainsford leaped up on the rail to get greater elevation.
sentences.cn: 伦思孚跳上船栏去,以便在更高处眺望.

sentences.en: The center tramway portion depresses below the roadway elevation.
sentences.cn: 中间电车道落低到车行道以下.

sentences.en: The city is at an elevation of 2 000 metres.
The elevation and configuration of the launch pad also require consideration.
sentences.cn: 提升机和发射台的外形也需要考虑.

sentences.en: The elevation or side view is known as a dendrogram.
sentences.cn: 立视图式侧视图又叫树枝状图.

sentences.en: the front elevation of a house
The gun was fired at an elevation of 60 degrees.
The house is at an elevation of 2 , 000 metres.
sentences.cn: 那幢房子位于海拔两千米的高处.

sentences.en: There was more good - natured banter about Celias'double elevation'before the evening ended.
sentences.cn: 这天晚上,大家还就西莉亚的 “ 双重提升”开了些善意的玩笑.

sentences.en: We're probably at an elevation of about 13,000 feet above sea level.
sentences.cn: 我们可能在大约海拔13,000英尺的高度。

words.tran_cn: 提高的；高尚的；严肃的；欢欣的
提高；抬起；振奋；提拔（elevate的过去分词）
提升；举起；振奋情绪等；提升…的职位
[地理]高地；海拔；提高；崇高；正面图

phrases.tran_cn: 地面高程；室外地面标高；地面海拔

trans.tran_cn: 提拔，提升，海拔，高地，升高，〈建〉立视图
trans.tran_en: the height of a place, especially its height above sea level
